imdb.plot outline: This series, broadcast by Colors TV, takes viewers on a journey to the mystical Himalayan mountains where they discover an ancient lineage of master healers that knew the secrets to living longer, healthier, and happier lives. The show follows Dr. Pankaj Naram, chosen as current head of the unbroken Siddha-Veda lineage (which goes back more than 2,500+ years to Master Jivaka, personal physician for Buddha), and the people from around the world whose lives have been saved or changed dramatically as a result of the ancient healing secrets. The episodes reveal the 6 ancient healing instruments or methods which anyone can use to transform and improve the quality of their mind, body, and emotions.
imdb.title: Ancient Healing
plot: This new series, broadcast by Colors TV, follows Dr. Pankaj Naram, a world authority on _Ancient Healing_ (qv) methods. It also reveals the stories of people who have been saved and changed by the 2,500+ year old _Ancient Healing_ (qv) Secrets.

This series, broadcast by Colors TV, takes viewers on a journey to the mystical Himalayan mountains where they discover an ancient lineage of master healers that knew the secrets to living longer, healthier, and happier lives. The show follows Dr. Pankaj Naram, chosen as current head of the unbroken Siddha-Veda lineage (which goes back more than 2,500+ years to Master Jivaka, personal physician for Buddha), and the people from around the world whose lives have been saved or changed dramatically as a result of the ancient healing secrets. The episodes reveal the 6 ancient healing instruments or methods which anyone can use to transform and improve the quality of their mind, body, and emotions.
